mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(memberno, id, passwd, name, phone, email, zipcode, address1, address2, rdate) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(memberno), 0)+1 as memberno FROM member), #{id}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT memberno, id, passwd, name, phone, zipcode, address1, address2, rdate FROM member ORDER BY memberno ASC

SELECT memberno, id, passwd, name, phone,email, zipcode, address1, address2, rdate FROM member
WHERE memberno=#{memberno}
WHERE memberno=#{memberno} AND name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
ORDER BY memberno DESC
